mapper.select: SELECT m.match_id, p.participant_id, m.team, m.opponent, m.result, q.quarter_result, q.quarter_id, q.quarter_name, mem.member_id, mem.name, mem.position, mem.back_number, p.goal, p.assist, p.tackle, p.save, TO_CHAR(m.match_date, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"')match_date FROM participant p JOIN quarter q ON p.quarter_id = q.quarter_id JOIN match m ON q.match_id = m.match_id JOIN member mem ON p.member_id = mem.member_id WHERE mem.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY q.quarter_name

SELECT TO_CHAR(m.match_date, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"')match_date, m.match_id, q.quarter_id, m.team, m.opponent, m.team_match_score, m.opponent_match_score, m.result, q.quarter_name, q.team_quarter_score, q.opponent_quarter_score, q.quarter_result, p.member_id, mem.name, mem.position, mem.back_number, p.goal, p.assist, p.tackle, p.save FROM participant p JOIN quarter q ON p.quarter_id = q.quarter_id JOIN match m ON q.match_id = m.match_id JOIN member mem ON p.member_id = mem.member_id
m.match_id = #{matchId} OR p.member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT match_id, team, opponent, result, TO_CHAR(match_date, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"')match_date, team_match_score, opponent_match_score FROM match ORDER BY match_date DESC

SELECT p.member_id, m.match_id, TO_CHAR(m.match_date, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"')match_date, m.team_match_score, SUM(p.goal) AS total_goal, SUM(p.assist) AS total_assist, SUM(p.tackle) AS total_tackle, SUM(p.save) AS total_save FROM match m JOIN quarter q ON m.match_id = q.match_id JOIN participant p ON q.quarter_id = p.quarter_id WHERE m.match_id = #{matchId} AND p.member_id = #{memberId} GROUP BY p.member_id, m.match_id, m.team_match_score, m.match_date
